entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 11 except 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 late this afternoon. High 11 except 7 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low plus 2 except minus 4 in low lying areas.
